name: Sacrificial Sword
title: Composed: Sacrificial Sword
desc: This blade was just a prop before its blade was sharpened by the passage of time.
in_play_description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)

skills.desc: The character deals +1 DMG. After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round) (Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
